org.rdkit.knime.nodes.functionalgroupfilter

Class FunctionalGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.rdkit.knime.nodes.functionalgroupfilter.FunctionalGroup

  • public class FunctionalGroup
extends java.lang.Object
    The class to represent a functional group and its properties.
    Author:
    Dillip K Mohanty, Manuel Schwarze

    • Constructor Detail

      • FunctionalGroup

        public FunctionalGroup(java.lang.String strLine)
                throws java.text.ParseException
        Creates a new functional group from the specified line that has been taken from a definition file. It must be in the following format:
        Name\tSmarts\tLabel\tRemovalReaction (optional)
        Optional leading and trailing whitespaces will be cut off. The Label will be taken as display name.
        Parameters:
        strLine - Line of functional group definition file. Must not be null.
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException - Thrown, if the functional group could not be parsed from the specified line. The message will contain the error.

      • FunctionalGroup

        public FunctionalGroup(java.lang.String uniqueName,
                       java.lang.String smarts,
                       java.lang.String label,
                       java.lang.String removalReaction,
                       java.lang.String displayLabel)
        Creates a new functional group with the specified values functional group.
        Parameters:
        uniqueName - The unique name of the group. Must not be null.
        smarts - The SMARTS to identify the group. Must not be null.
        label - A friendly name of the group. Usually also used as display label. Must not be null.
        removalReaction - Reaction to remove the functional group from the molecule. This is necessary for cases like boronic ethers where the full functional group cannot be specified in SMARTS. Can be null.

    • Method Detail

        Returns the unique name of the functional group.

        public java.lang.String getLabel()
        Returns the label of the functional group.
        Returns:

      • getRemovalReaction

        public java.lang.String getRemovalReaction()
        Returns the optional removal reaction to remove the functional group from the molecule. This is necessary for cases like boronic ethers where the full functional group cannot be specified in SMARTS.
        Returns:
        The removal reaction, if set. Otherwise null.

      • getDisplayLabel

        public java.lang.String getDisplayLabel()
        Returns the label that will be used to display the functional group to the user.
        Returns:
        The display label.

      • setDisplayLabel

        Sets an alternative display label for this functional group.
        Parameters:
        displayLabel - The displayLabel to set. Must not be null.

      • getTooltip

        public java.lang.String getTooltip()
        Creates a string presentation for this functional group to be used as a tooltip.
        Returns:
        Tooltip representation.
